titles.title: Special Diabetes Program for Indians Reauthorization Act of 2017
Special Diabetes Program for Indians Reauthorization Act of 2017
A bill to reauthorize the special diabetes programs for Indians.
Special Diabetes Program for Indians Reauthorization Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Special Diabetes Program for Indians Reauthorization Act of 2017
This bill amends the Public Health Service Act to extend through FY2024 funding for the Special Diabetes Program for Indians.
